title: How did politics affect the Great Depression? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Sorry, I have no time to write a whole essay, but let me suggest studying World history from 1914 till 1939, especially the relations between Germany, France, England and the United States (including the bank- and credit politcy in the USA) and Russia. There are excellent films on YouTube on the Great Depression, watch them, and you can get easily the answer.
